## Professional experience

```{r}
#| results: asis

read_excel(path, sheet = "experience") %>%
  select(start:organization) %>%
  drop_na(title) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  mutate(end = if_else(is.na(end), today(), end)) %>%
  arrange(desc(end)) %>%
  rowid_to_column() %>%
  mutate(
    month_start = month(start, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE),
    month_end = month(end, label = TRUE, abbr = TRUE),
    date_range = glue("{month_start}. {year(start)}--{month_end}. {year(end)}"),
    jobs = glue("{rowid}. {date_range}. **{title}**, {organization}.")
  ) %>%
  pull(jobs)
```
